name: Riddle
description:
This game is about the riddle that exist 'spatially', not words. Facing personal thoughts through this space-existing riddle.  

We live and pass in a routine and inertial world every day. But there is something that keeps way off. We thought we understood about the world around us, about our life. But something that suddenly appear between  ideologies and objective realities world made whole things become a riddle....I'm still in a strange space even if I open my eyes.
